lead_paragraph: After a praying mantis showed up in the dugout on Aug. 6, struggling Kansas City began winning. Now, with a new mascot in tow, the Royals feel another World Series title is possible.

headline.print_headline: Left for Dead, Royals Revive on a Wing and a Praying Insect
headline.main: Left for Dead, Royals Revive on a Wing and a Praying Insect

snippet: After a praying mantis showed up in the dugout on Aug. 6, struggling Kansas City began winning. Now, with a new mascot in tow, the Royals feel another World Series title is possible....
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column assesses Kansas City Royals, defending world series champions who are scrambling to make playoffs after slow start.
